message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I think $150 would be a fair price for me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $175. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product's value is worth a bit more than $150.
I understand your perspective, Alice. I think $160 would be a reasonable price for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we settle on $170? I think it's a fair compromise.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I believe $165 would be a fair price for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting, Bob! I'm willing to give a bit more. How about we meet at $168? It's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I think $167 would be a fair price for the product.
I'm getting close to the end of my rope, Bob! I'm willing to give a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the farm. How about we meet at $169? It's my final offer.
I respect your final offer, Alice. I think $168 would be a fair price for the product.
